constraints: Completeness ("full"): The response provides a thorough answer for normal use, covering all major aspects without needing every micro-detail.

Scope ("fail"): The response focuses on breakdowns, stress, uncertainty, or limits by examining how and under what conditions something stops working—risks, edge cases, fragility, or failure modes rather than overall quality or preferred outcomes.
Channel ("jira"): The response formats the content using Jira markup (headings, lists, panels) where relevant and avoids extra explanation beyond the main material.
